divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing out on my balcony, smoking a cigarette, and looking out into thenight sky at approx. 5:50 a.m. I saw this large light grey object moving fromthe south-southwest toward me. My initial reaction was What is that? I watchedwith amazement as I realized it was moving very quickly and smoothly. When itreached its closest I was suddenly struck be several reactions:It was movingfaster than any jet I had ever seen3B It was huge, maybe over 100 feet in length and nearly so in height, somewhateliptical in shape (it was difficult to determine its size in the night sky)
Summary: large light grey object , nighttime, Seattle
trends: There have been 110 other sightings in Seattle
There were no other sightings in Seattle on or around February 3rd 2001
